content: double_crochet in next 12 double_crochet fpdc next two fptr together double_crochet in next 11 double_crochet repeat from * 3 times ending at ** double_crochet in last 3 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of chain 3 finish off 160 double_crochet 8 fpdc 4 chain-2 sps please let me know if you find any mistakes or if you need clarification on any of the stitches for any comments questions or pattern support please contact me at cvanostran@gmail com please do not copy sale or redistribute pattern without my consent you are free to sell the made item but i ask that you use your own photos you are not allowed to use the copyrighted picture s shown i would love to have you share pictures of your completed project on my facebook page at nana s whimsical crochet
